channel.title: ModernApps Learning Events on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home
channel.description: Recent content in ModernApps Learning Events on ModernApps by VMware Tanzu Home

item.title: ModernApps SRE Live!
item.description: About Event There is a huge gap between classroom learning and the complexities of real-world environments, and during times of significant change this gap is formidable.

item.title: ModernApps Learning Weekly Office Hours
item.description: About Event The office hours call is a place where any member can ask any question about the ModernApps Learning program, and where members can share and discuss insights about devops and cloud native technologies.

item.title: ModernApps SRE Live - Hackathon Week Checkin
item.description: About Event This week we will be checking in on the progress for the ModernApps Live June 2021 Hackathon Week!

item.title: Hackathon Week!
item.description: About Event Hackathon week provides an opportunity to contribute to community, network with peers and learn and gain experience by opening and resolving issue tickets, make github commits with content updates, or even help with new site features!

item.title: ModernApps SRE Live! + Hackathon Kickoff Call
item.description: About Event For the call on 6-25-21, the SRE Live call will be hosting the kickoff for the ModernApps Learning Hackathon Weekend!

item.title: Call Cancelled for 6/18/21 -- ModernApps SRE Live! -- In Observance of Juneteenth
item.description: Call Cancelled on 6/18/21 in Observance of Juneteenth To borrow from VMware’s internal announcement – “Juneteenth ― a blend of the words June and nineteenth ― is an important day for America as it commemorates the end of slavery on June 19, 1865, which is two years after the Emancipation Proclamation was issued.

item.title: Cancelled: ModernApps SRE Live!
item.description: ModernApps SRE Live will be cancelled 6/11/21. We will resume at the usual time on 6/18.
